mapper.select: SELECT msc.msc_no, msc.msc_code, msc.msc_name, msc.msc_profit, msc.msc_dividend, msc.msc_payout_ratio, msc.msc_comment, msc.msc_status, msc.msc_delete, msc.user_id, msc.insert_time, msc.update_time, us.ust_no, us.ust_classify, us.ust_sale_cost, us.ust_sale_cnt, us.ust_sale_total, us.ust_stock_cnt, us.ust_comment, us.ust_status, us.ust_delete, us.msc_no, us.msc_name, us.insert_time, us.update_time FROM (SELECT * FROM plugins_m_stock_company WHERE msc_no = #{mscNo} AND user_id = #{userId} AND msc_delete = '0') msc LEFT JOIN plugins_user_stock us ON msc.msc_no = us.msc_no WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND msc_delete = '0' ORDER BY msc_no LIMIT #{nowPage}, #{row}
